original_text: Now concerning brotherly love you have no need for anyone to write to you, for you yourselves have been taught by God to love one another,
korean_text: 형제 사랑에 관하여는 너희에게 쓸 것이 없음은 너희들 자신이 하나님의 가르치심을 받아 서로 사랑함이라

sentences.original_text: you have no need for anyone to write to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게는 누가 써 줄 필요가 없습니다

sentences.original_text: for you yourselves have been taught by God
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 친히 하나님께 가르침을 받았으니
